as.description: The element or component the Disclosure should render as.
as.description_zh: Disclosure 应呈现为的元素或组件。

defaultOpen.description: Whether or not the Disclosure component should be open by default.
defaultOpen.description_zh: 默认情况下是否应打开 Disclosure 组件。

slots.name: open
slots.description: Whether or not the disclosure is open.
